question: He was elected as the President of the Badminton Association of India (BAI) for the next 4 years.
explanation: Himanta Biswa Sarma was elected as the President of the Badminton Association of India (BAI) for the next 4 years. He is a Cabinet Minister in Assam. He took charge as the interim President of BAI in 2017 following the death of former BAI president Akhilesh Das Gupta. Former Tamil Nadu Badminton Association president and Lok Sabha MP from Dharmapuri constituency, Dr. Anbumani Ramadoss was elected as the treasurer uncontested. Ajay Singhania of Haryana Badminton Association was elected as General Secretary of BAI.
